special_abilities.name: Imperceptible
special_abilities.desc: The Maalraas utilize the force as a type of camouflage. Only an exceptionally high perception check (DC20+) would be able to discern its presence. When in combat, any creature attacking the Maalraas has disadvantage on attack rolls unless the creature is force sensitive.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Maalraas attacks once with its claws and once with its tusks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, one target. Hit 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tusks
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, one target. Hit 17 (2d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
